attributes.action: Petition to keep the BBC as it is, neutral and independent of private ownership
attributes.additional_details: A petition to call on the government to retain the status and ownership of BBC as it is. That the British people note that the BBC is one of the last British institutions respected all over the world and provides unbiased news which isn't influenced by corporate power. The British people further note the dire lack of news outlets like the BBC which report news and not their opinions on the news.
